ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Its fruits are just like the heads of shaytans.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Its spathes are like the prickly pear.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Its spathes are like the heads of satans.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and its fruits are like the heads of devils.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Its fruit like the heads of demons.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: The shoots of its fruit stalks are like the heads of Shayatin.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Its produce is as it were the heads of the serpents.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: its spathes are as the heads of Satans,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Its crop is as it were the heads of devils
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and its fruits are like devils' heads.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: The fruit thereof is as though the hoods of the serpents.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Its spathes are as if they were devils’ heads.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The shoots of its fruit-stalks are like the heads of devils:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: The shoots of its fruit-stalks are like the heads of Shayatin (devils);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: its spathes are like the heads of satans
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Its fruits are like the devils’ heads.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Its emerging fruit as if it was heads of the devils.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:65] Its spathes, likened to the spathes of a date-palm, are like the heads of devils, [as] vile-looking snakes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Its crop) its fruit (is as it were the heads of devils) the heads of snakes which resemble devils. This kind of snakes is found near Yemen.
